name: Registry Run Key Persistence [T1547.001]
description: Detects modification of Windows Registry Run/RunOnce keys used for persistence. Fawkes C2 agent uses 'persist -method registry' to write to HKCU/HKLM Run keys.
query: registry.path:(*CurrentVersion*Run* OR *CurrentVersion*RunOnce* OR *CurrentVersion*RunServices*) AND NOT process.executable:(*msiexec.exe OR *svchost.exe OR *Microsoft*)
false_positives: Legitimate software installations writing Run keys
Group Policy client updating startup entries
author: blue-team-agent
